entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having a lightning scar on his forehead and being able to see himself reflected in others' eyes.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A wand maker who is introduced as an expert in wands, described as having a long white finger that touches Harry's lightning scar.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, described as having a good wand made of oak wood that was snapped in half when he got expelled.

relationships.description: Mr. Ollivander sold the wand that was used to cast a spell on Harry, which is described as being very powerful but in the wrong hands.
Mr. Ollivander made a wand for Hagrid, which is described as being good but snapped in half when Hagrid got expelled.
